title: Jacket
description: black with raised embroidered band down front, bottom and vent in purple, grey and pink; sleeve cuff of grey silk with embroidered band inset with pink, white, red on blue; neck band of white on blue; pounded indigo
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
